articles.title: ChatGPT in iPhones? Apple renews talks with OpenAI for adding generative AI features in iOS 18 update - HT Tech
articles.description: Apple CEO Tim Cook said that the company was investing "significantly" in generative AI.
articles.content:
Apple Inc has renewed discussions with OpenAI about using the startup's generative AI technology to power some new features being introduced in the iPhone later this year, Bloomberg News reported.
